pullrequest.title: Building Editor: Pick colors from the palette and assign on 3D view

content.raw:
I tried this:

* Select a color from the palette.
* Click on an object on the 2D view (I'm a bad ass).
* If you hover on the 3D view the icon doesn't have the colored square anymore (although if you click, the paint function works).
content.html:
I tried this:

  • Select a color from the palette.
  • Click on an object on the 2D view (I'm a bad ass).
  • If you hover on the 3D view the icon doesn't have the colored square anymore (although if you click, the paint function works).
